desc_content.paragraph: Bases: cinder.volume.drivers.dell_emc.vnx.replication.ReplicationAdapter
Assures that host is connected to the Array.
It first registers initiators to storage_group then add volume to storage_group.

list_item.paragraph: storage_group – object of storops storage group to which the host access is registered.
host – common.Host object with initiator information.
volume – common.Volume object with volume information.
is_new_sg – flag indicating whether the storage_group is newly created or not.

desc_content.paragraph: Assures that the storage group with name of host exists.
If the storage group doesn’t exist, create a one.
Registers the initiators to storage group.

list_item.paragraph: storage_group – storage group object to which the initiator is registered.
host – information of initiator, etc.

desc_content.paragraph: The behavior depends on the combination of the registered initiators of SG and the configured white list of the ports (that is self.config.io_port_list).

list_item.paragraph: Register all non-registered initiators to self.allowed_ports.

definition_list_item.term: For registered initiators, if the white list is configured, register

definition.paragraph: them to self.allowed_ports except the ones which are already registered.

desc_content.paragraph: Note that self.allowed_ports comprises of all iSCSI/FC ports on array or the valid ports of the white list if self.config.io_port_list is configured.
Creates a CG snapshot(snap group).
Clones a group
Creates a clone of the specified volume.
Creates a group from a group snapshot.
Creates a group_snapshot.
Creates a snapshot.
Creates a EMC volume.
Constructs a work flow to create a volume from snapshot.

list_item.paragraph: volume – new volume
snapshot – base snapshot

desc_content.paragraph: This flow will do the following:

list_item.paragraph: Create a snap mount point (SMP) for the snapshot.
Attach the snapshot to the SMP created in the first step.
Create a temporary lun prepare for migration. (Skipped if snapcopy=’true’)
Start a migration between the SMP and the temp lun. (Skipped if snapcopy=’true’)

desc_content.paragraph: Deletes a CG snapshot(snap group).
Deletes a consistency group.
Deletes a group snapshot.
Deletes a snapshot.
Deletes an EMC volume.
Extends an EMC volume.
Initializes the connection to cinder_volume.
Initializes connection for snapshot mount point.
Imports the existing backend storage object as a volume.
or

When the volume has a volume_type, the driver inspects that and compare against the properties of the referenced backend storage object. If they are incompatible, raise a ManageExistingVolumeTypeMismatch exception.
Returns size of volume to be managed by manage_existing.
Leverage the VNX on-array migration functionality.
This method is invoked at the source backend.
Removes the host access from volume.

list_item.paragraph: volume – common.Volume object with volume information.
host – common.Host object with host information.
sg – object of storops storage group.

desc_content.paragraph: Changes volume from one type to another.
Terminates the connection to cinder_volume.
Terminates connection for snapshot mount point.
Unmanages a volume.
Updates a group.
Updates metadata after host-assisted migration.
Bases: cinder.volume.drivers.dell_emc.vnx.adapter.CommonAdapter
Prepares the target data for Nova.

list_item.paragraph: storage_group – object of storops storage group.
host – common.Host object with initiator information.
volume – common.Volume object with volume information.
hlu – the HLU number assigned to volume.

desc_content.paragraph: Retrieves stats info.
Bases: cinder.volume.drivers.dell_emc.vnx.adapter.CommonAdapter
Arranges IO ports.
Arranges the registered IO ports and puts a pingable port in the first place as the main portal.
Prepares the target data for Nova.

list_item.paragraph: storage_group – object of storops storage group.
host – common.Host object with initiator information.
volume – common.Volume object with volume information.
hlu – the HLU number assigned to volume.

desc_content.paragraph: Retrieves stats info.
